abilities.name: Frontline Shock
abilities.description: +1D on first melee attack after moving.

abilities.name: Blast Specialist
abilities.description: Grenades have +1'' splash radius.

abilities.name: Swift Messenger
abilities.description: Once per round, +2'' free Move before or after activation (Does not trigger opportunity attacks).

abilities.name: Quick Reflexes
abilities.description: +1D to Defense roll against Melee attacks.

abilities.name: Lorekeeper
abilities.description: Aura of +1 Morale to allies within 6''.

abilities.name: Caster
abilities.description: Has access to the following Powers.

powers.name: Sigil of Interdiction
powers.flavor: No passage but by oaths sealed. No action but by Name revoked.
powers.baseEffect: Target enemy within 12'' loses 1 Action on their next activation.
overdrive: 2+ Successes: Target enemy loses 1 Action more.
3+ Successes: Target's Defense is also lowered by 1 until end of turn.
4+ Successes: Target's Defense is also lowered by 1 until end of turn.
powers.critFail: Caster loses 1 Action next turn and suffers –1 Defense until end of turn per Critical Fail.

powers.name: Archivist's Doomscript
powers.flavor: Their fate was written before the ink dried.
powers.baseEffect: Target enemy takes 1 Wound.
overdrive: 2+: Target enemy takes additional 1 Wound
3+: Target enemy takes another additional 1 Wound
4+: Target also becomes Staggered
powers.critFail: Caster suffers 1 Wound per Critical Fail.

powers.name: Sealed Ordinance
powers.flavor: I inscribe prohibition: let no machine fire nor lash obey.
powers.baseEffect: Target enemy within 12'' suffers –1 Dice on their weapon attacks during their next activation.
overdrive: 2+ Successes: Target enemy suffers another –1 Dice.
3+ Successes: Target's attacks lose all special traits (e.g., Brutal, Precise) this round.
4+ Successes: Weapon critical damage is also reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 1) until end of next activation.
powers.critFail: Caster suffers Wound (1) and cannot use any Rites until they successfully Rally per Critical Fail.

abilities.name: Repair Protocol
abilities.description: Heal 1 Wound on a friendly unit within 4'' once per round.

abilities.name: Caster
abilities.description: Has access to the following powers:

powers.name: Rite of Binding Conduit
powers.flavor: Flesh is fault. Circuit is certainty.
powers.baseEffect: Select one friendly unit within 6''. That unit gains +1 Defense until the start of your next turn.
overdrive: 2+ successes: The unit also gains +1 Movement until the start of your next turn.
3+ successes: The unit gains +1 Action on its next activation.
4+ successes: The Mechanist may choose a second friendly unit within '' to also gain the base effect.
powers.critFail: For each Crit Fail, the Mechanist suffers –1 Action on their next activation.

powers.name: Subsystem Reforge
powers.flavor: Systems corrupted—rerouting integrity.
powers.baseEffect: Remove 1 Condition (e.g., Blinded, Bleeding, Suppressed) from a friendly unit within 3''. That unit also heals 1 Resilience if it was affected by a Condition.
overdrive: 2+ successes: Remove up to 2 Conditions from the target.
3+ successes: The target gains +1 Action this activation (if they have not yet activated this round).
4+ successes: Target becomes immune to Conditions until the end of the round.
powers.critFail: For each Crit Fail, the Mechanist becomes Suppressed and cannot use Powers next round.

powers.name: Electrostatic Field
powers.flavor: The unseen current binds and disrupts.
powers.baseEffect: Choose one enemy unit within 6''. That unit suffers –1 Action on its next activation and cannot use Reactions during that activation.
overdrive: 2+ successes: The target also suffers –1 Defense until the start of your next turn.
3+ successes: The Mechanist may select a second enemy unit within 4'' of the first target to suffer the same effects.
4+ successes: Enemies affected cannot benefit from cover until the start of your next turn.
powers.critFail: For each Crit Fail, the Mechanist becomes Staggered and loses 1 Action next turn.

abilities.name: Knight's Resolve (Aura)
abilities.description: Allies in 2'' gain +1 Morale & +1 Defense.

abilities.name: Heavy Strike
abilities.description: +1 Damage on charging melee attacks.

abilities.name: Bonded Valor
abilities.description: Once per round, when you roll a Critical Fail on Defense, a friendly unit within 2'' takes that Wound instead.

abilities.name: Weapon Overdrive
abilities.description: May add up to (Reactor) Dice to Attack roll, but takes that many wounds when the first Critical Fail is rolled.

abilities.name: Bloodsong of Rage
abilities.description:
Effect: Friendly unit within 8" gains +1 Dice to melee attacks until end of turn.

Overdrive:

2+: +1 Die

3+: Add Brutal to attacks

4+: Unit gains +1 Action this turn

Backlash: Target unit takes 1 Wound.

abilities.name: Fleshwarp Chant
abilities.description:
Effect: Target enemy within 8" takes -1 Defense until end of next turn.

Overdrive:

2+: -1 Defense

3+: Target cannot Evade or use Cover bonuses

4+: Target suffers 1 Mortal Wound

Backlash: Caster cannot Move next activation.

abilities.name: Beastmind Dissonance
abilities.description:
Effect: Target enemy suffers -1 Resolve and -1 Morale until end of game round.

Overdrive:

2+: -1 Resolve/Morale

3+: Target must test Morale immediately

4+: Also becomes Staggered

Backlash: All Beastman units within 6" test Morale immediately.

abilities.name: Flicker Protocol (1/game)
abilities.description: Once per battle, this unit may activate dormant reflex enhancers at the start of its activation. Until the end of the turn, it may reroll all failed Defense dice.

abilities.name: Overstim Gland
abilities.description: At the start of each of this unit's activations, roll 1D6. On a result of 6, it gains +1 Action for this turn but suffers 1 Wound at the end of its activation.

abilities.name: Loping Dash
abilities.description: When performing a Move action, may move through friendly units and ignore Difficult Ground for that Move.

abilities.name: Shard-Sync Protocol
abilities.description: At the start of its activation, may target one friendly unit within 6''. Until end of turn, it may choose to either: Transfer up to 2 Wounds taken by the target to itself (immediately), or grant the target rerolls on all 1s when making Attack rolls this round.

powers.name: Protocol: Memory Bleed
powers.flavor: They were not built to forget.
powers.baseEffect: Choose an enemy unit within 8''. That unit becomes Confused until the end of its next activation. Confused units must target the nearest model (friend or foe) with their first Action, if eligible.
overdrive: 2+ successes: The target also suffers –1 Defense until the end of the turn.
3+ successes: Target cannot receive buffs or reroll dice during its next activation.
4+ successes: You may choose a second enemy unit within 4'' of the original target to also become Confused.
powers.critFail: For each [Crit Fail], the Neural Shardbearer suffers –1 Action next turn.

powers.name: Protocol: Ghost Signal
powers.flavor: Echoes carry more than words.
powers.baseEffect: Choose one friendly unit within 6''. That unit may immediately reroll any number of failed dice in its next Attack or Defense roll.
overdrive: 2+ successes: The target also gains +1 Defense until the start of your next turn.
3+ successes: The target also recovers 1 Wound.
4+ successes: You may select a second friendly unit within 6'' to receive the same effect.
powers.critFail: For each [Crit Fail], the Shardbearer suffers 1 Wound.

powers.name: Protocol: Fate-Shard Detonation
powers.flavor: All threads tangle in the end.
powers.baseEffect: All friendly units within 6'' of the Shardbearer are immediately affected by the top Fate Card drawn. This includes the Shardbearer. The effect resolves as written—whether beneficial or harmful.
overdrive: 2+ successes: You may reroll the Fate Card once and keep either result.
3+ successes: Friendly units affected gain +1 Morale this round.
4+ successes: If the card deals Wounds, ignore the first Wound suffered by each friendly unit.
powers.critFail: For each [Crit Fail], the Shardbearer immediately draws and applies an additional Fate Card effect to itself.

abilities.name: Last Directive (1/game)
abilities.description: Once per battle, if within 6'' of two or more friendly units, Directive-Lost may issue a burst command: choose two nearby friendly units to each make a free 1-Action Move or Melee Attack.

abilities.name: Bastion Field
abilities.description: While this unit remains stationary, all friendly units within 3" gain +1 Defense.

abilities.name: Shield Anchor
abilities.description: Cannot be involuntarily moved by enemy effects or powers.

abilities.name: Bleed Forward
abilities.description: If this unit causes a Wound in melee, it may move 2" immediately after.

powers.name: Veilskin
powers.flavor: The world sees nothing but fog and shadow.
powers.baseEffect: This unit cannot be targeted by ranged attacks from over 12'' away unless the attacker is on Elevated terrain.
overdrive: 2+ successes: This unit gains +1 Defense until the start of your next turn.
3+ successes: This unit gains +2'' to move this turn.
4+ successes: This unit cannot be targeted by ranged attacks until the start of your next turn.
powers.critFail: The unit becomes visible to all enemy units, and can be targeted by attacks through Blocking terrain made by units within 12''.

abilities.name: Resonance Field
abilities.description: Once per round, an allied unit within 6" may re-roll 1 failed die.

powers.name: Chime of the Fractured Will
powers.flavor: A discordant toll unravels command.
powers.baseEffect: Choose one enemy unit within 8''. That unit suffers --1 Morale until the end of the round.
overdrive: 2+ successes: The target also suffers --1 Action on its next activation.
3+ successes: The target cannot contest Objectives this round.
4+ successes: The target must take a Morale Test immediately.
powers.critFail: Caster suffers --1 Morale until the start of your next turn.

powers.name: Echoes of Harmony
powers.flavor: Let all things move in concert.
powers.baseEffect: Select one friendly unit within 6''. That unit gains +1 to all dice rolls for the duration of its next activation.
overdrive: 2+ successes: The target may reroll 1 failed die during its next activation.
3+ successes: The target gains +1 Defense until the end of the round.
4+ successes: The target also restores 1 Wound.
powers.critFail: The caster may not use further powers this round.

powers.name: Binding Pulse
powers.flavor: Flesh and thought still in rhythm.
powers.baseEffect: Select an enemy unit within 6''. That unit is Slowed until the end of the round.
overdrive: 2+ successes: The target also suffers --1 Defense until its next activation.
3+ successes: The target cannot declare Charges this round.
4+ successes: The target immediately ends any current effects that grant extra Actions or Movement.
powers.critFail: The Harmonist suffers 1 Wound per Critical fail.

abilities.name: Battlefield Mandate
abilities.description: Once per game, you may interrupt initiative and activate (Reactor) friendly units out of sequence and take (Reactor) Wounds.

powers.name: Order: Strike True
powers.flavor: Precision guides the hand of all.
powers.baseEffect: Aura 6'': All friendly units within range gain +1 to hit on the Attack Rolls.
overdrive: 2+ successes: Allies also gain +1 Defense until the start of your next turn.
3+ successes: Allies may re-roll one failed attack die during that attack.
4+ successes: Aura radius increases to 8'' for this activation.
powers.critFail: Aura 6'': All friendly unit within range gain -[Critical Fails] dice to Attack Rolls

abilities.name: Unbreaking Frame
abilities.description: Gains +1 Defense when within 3'' of any ally.

abilities.name: Seal of Dominion
abilities.description: Cannot be suppressed or slowed by effects or terrain.

abilities.name: Order: Cast it Down
abilities.description: Choose [Reactor] units within 6''. These units and Judicator then attack the same enemy unit simultaneously, regardless of their activation status. Take [Reactor] wounds on every unit if Critical fail is rolled on Attack Roll.

abilities.name: Fleetfooted
abilities.description: Gains +1 Movement and ignores Difficult Terrain.

abilities.name: Sharpshooter
abilities.description: May reroll one failed attack die per activation if target is within 12''.

abilities.name: Deathflare
abilities.description: Upon destruction, this unit places a Burning 1 token on up to two enemy units within 4''.

abilities.name: Expendable
abilities.description: This unit may not buy any equipment.

abilities.name: No Experience
abilities.description: Cannot gain Experience or upgrades.

abilities.name: Kindled Anger
abilities.description: Gains +1 Attack while adjacent to at least one Burning enemy.

powers.name: Ashborne Fury
powers.flavor: The ashes of our fallen ignite my resolve.
powers.baseEffect: At the start of your activation, count allied Troop units destroyed this turn within 6''. For each, gain +1 Attack and +1 Defense until the end of this activation (max +3).
overdrive: 2+ successes: Additionally, you may move up to 3'' ignoring terrain penalties.
3+ successes: You may make a free melee attack after moving.
4+ successes: Heal 1 Wound.
powers.critFail: Suffer [Critical Fail] Wounds per allied Troop units destroyed this turn within 6''.

abilities.name: Flameguard Aura (Aura 4'')
abilities.description: Allies gain +[Reactor] Defense while they have any Wounds lost.

abilities.name: Sacred Ashes
abilities.description: When an allied Troop unit is destroyed within 6'', this unit heals 1 Wound or gains 1 Reactor.

abilities.name: Mourning Chorus
abilities.description: When an allied unit dies within 6'', you may cause an enemy unit within 6'' to suffer a Morale test.

abilities.name: Pyre's Whisper
abilities.description: Once per round, a friendly unit within 6'' may reroll one failed Defense die.

powers.name: Whispering Embers
powers.flavor: Hope flickers even in the darkest flames.
powers.baseEffect: Grant a friendly unit within 6'' the ability to reroll one failed Defense die during their next activation.
overdrive: 2+ successes: The reroll can be attempted on two dice.
3+ successes: The unit gains +1 Morale until the start of your next turn.
4+ successes: The unit gains +1 Action on its next activation.
powers.critFail: Caster must reroll [Critical Hits] successful Defence Dice until next activation.

powers.name: Eulogy of Shadows
powers.flavor: Silence falls, but our voices echo.
powers.baseEffect: Select one enemy unit within 6''. That unit must pass a Morale test or suffer –1 Action on its next activation.
overdrive: 2+ successes: The enemy unit also suffers –1 Defense until the start of your next turn.
3+ successes: The enemy unit may not move during its next activation.
4+ successes: The enemy unit cannot use Ranged attacks during its next activation.
powers.critFail: Caster immediately breaks and falls back [Critical Fail] Dice inches towards the nearest table border.

powers.name: Gravebound Command
powers.flavor: Rise, and fight for the fallen.
powers.baseEffect: Choose one friendly Troop unit within 6''. That unit gains +1 Attack and may ignore negative status effects for this activation.
overdrive: 2+ successes: The chosen unit may reroll one failed attack die this activation.
3+ successes: The chosen unit may perform a free Charge action immediately after its activation.
4+ successes: After this unit's activation, immediately activate one other friendly Troop unit within 6''.
powers.critFail: Caster loses [Critical Fail] Wounds.

abilities.name: Death's Beacon
abilities.description: When an allied Troop unit is destroyed within 6'', gain +1 Reactor.

abilities.name: Final Ignition
abilities.description: When this unit destroys an enemy, it may gain +1 Reactor.

abilities.name: Molten Retribution
abilities.description: Spend Action to deal Burning [Reactor] to all enemies within 3''.

abilities.name: Sanctified Ember (Aura 6'')
abilities.description: While an allied Troop unit is destroyed within range, all friendly Elites gain +1 Action and +1 Defense until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Flameborne Retribution
abilities.description: Each time this unit suffers a Wound, it may immediately unleash a free melee attack against an adjacent enemy.

abilities.name: Final Benediction
abilities.description: Upon death, all enemy units within 6'' suffer Burning 1 and must take a Morale test.

powers.name: Ashen Veil
powers.flavor: Let the smoke shield us.
powers.baseEffect: All friendly Elites within 6'' gain +1 Defense until the start of your next turn.
overdrive: 2+ successes: The Elites also gain +1 Move this activation.
3+ successes: Friendly Elites may ignore negative status effects until the start of your next turn.
4+ successes: You may immediately activate one friendly Elite unit within 6''.
powers.critFail: The caster becomes Suppressed until the start of their next activation.

powers.name: Seething Strike
powers.flavor: The flame of vengeance burns within!
powers.baseEffect: Make one melee attack with +1 to hit and +1 Damage.
overdrive: 2+ successes: The attack causes Burning 1 on the target.
3+ successes: The target is pushed 2'' directly away.
4+ successes: After the attack, the caster heals 1 Wound.
powers.critFail: The caster suffers [Critical Fails] Wounds this activation.

powers.name: Emberlord's Rally
powers.flavor: Rise and fight, as one flame!
powers.baseEffect: Select one friendly Elite unit within 6''. That unit gains +1 Action and +1 Defense until the start of your next turn.
overdrive: 2+ successes: The chosen unit may immediately make a free Move action.
3+ successes: If the chosen unit is adjacent to an enemy after moving, it may make a free melee attack.
4+ successes: Immediately activate one additional friendly Elite unit within 6''.
powers.critFail: The caster suffers [Critical Fails] Wounds this activation.
